caseTitle: Special Secretary-II (Law & Order), Home Tribal Affairs Department, Government of KP. Peshawar and others v. Fayyaz Dawar
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 14 of the National Disaster Management Ordinance, 2007 and Section 39 National Disaster Management Act, 2010 substituted by Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Act No.VI of 2012.  (2) Disputed questions of facts cannot be adjudicated in Writ jurisdiction.  (3) Delay defeats equity which aids the vigilant and not the indolent.  (4) Question of laches in the constitutional petition is considered in the light of conduct of the petitioner.  (5) Adequate remedy.
